name: Almohadín: Escape from the Basement
storyline: Almohadín is a pillow that suddenly came to life, transforming from an inanimate object into a vessel for a soul. Driven by curiosity, he decided to leave the room where he was. That's when he discovered the macabre world he was immersed in: The Basement. Dark, cold, damp. Violence reigns in every corner. Most inhabitants are in a deplorable mental state, except for a few who try to help Almohadín survive and uncover the truth. At some point, Almohadín learns something that changes everything: A legend says that by reaching the top floor of the basement, it is possible to escape to the outside world, the ideal place for any being. Motivated by this tale, Almohadín is determined to escape the basement as quickly as possible and will do whatever it takes to try. Story is divided into 13 acts, each with significant events that shape Almohadín’s development as a character: from his existential crisis to his bizarre battles against monsters that want to kill him.
summary: Almohadín: escape from the basement is a hard platformer game featuring fun mechanics, a variety of levels and enemies, and multiple ways to complete each stage! It also has an intriguing story that will captivate the reader. The Basement holds many mysteries, and Almohadín must take risks and uncover them to find a way out into the outside world. Join him on his adventure!
